The second single of Camo & Krooked's second album, "''Make The Call''" was released on 12 September 2011 with "''In The Future''" as the second track.<ref>http://shop.hospitalrecords.com/product/nhs193/</ref> "''Make The Call''" is due to be their last released single prior to the album's release in the latter months of 2011, which in August 2011 was revealed to be named "''Cross The Line''"<ref>http://camoandkrooked.com/cross-the-line/</ref>. In BBC Radio 1's show of [[Fabio (DJ)|Fabio]] & [[Grooverider]] (12th of September), Camo & Krooked announced the album will be released on the 3rd of October. The Album will be available on 12â³ Vinyl, CD and by Digital Download, the album will be available for pre-order on [[iTunes]] soon.
The second single of Camo & Krooked's second album, "''Make The Call''" was released on 12 September 2011 with "''In The Future''" as the second track.<ref>http://shop.hospitalrecords.com/product/nhs193/</ref> "''Make The Call''" is due to be their last released single prior to the album's release in the latter months of 2011, which in August 2011 was revealed to be named "''Cross The Line''"<ref>http://camoandkrooked.com/cross-the-line/</ref>. In BBC Radio 1's show of [[Fabio (DJ)|Fabio]] & [[Grooverider]] (12th of September), Camo & Krooked announced the album will be released on the 3rd of October. The Album will be available on 12â³ Vinyl, CD and by Digital Download, the album will be available for pre-order on [[iTunes]] soon.
â   â
On Friday 25 November, Camo & Krooked perform at the UK's biggest bass music all-nighter of 2011, UKF Bass Culture at Alexandra Palace.
